item.title: Chip sales are set to soar in 2025 — so long as there isn’t a trade war | Deloitte
item.description: Deloitte said chip sales will soar in 2025, led by GenAI and data center build-outs, even as demand from PC and mobile markets may be weak.

item.title: Open-source revolution: How DeepSeek-R1 challenges OpenAI’s o1 with superior processing, cost efficiency
item.description: We dive deep into hands-on testing, practical implications and actionable insights to help you understand which model best suits their needs.

item.title: Anthropic claims new AI security method blocks 95% of jailbreaks, invites red teamers to try
item.description: The new Claude safeguards have already technically been broken but Anthropic says this was due to a glitch — try again.

item.title: OpenAI’s surprise new o3-powered ‘Deep Research’ mode shows the power of the AI agent era
item.description: OpenAI has also hinted at future integrations with custom datasets, which would allow organizations to leverage the tool.

item.title: How Thomson Reuters and Anthropic built an AI that tax professionals actually trust
item.description: Thomson Reuters integrates Anthropic's Claude AI into its legal and tax platforms, enhancing CoCounsel with AI tools that process on AWS.
